column1: Table 11. Average annual mortality rate per 100,000 jail inmates, by most serious current offense and cause of death, 2000–2007
Report title: Mortality in Local Jails, 2000-2007  NCJ 222988
Data source(s): Deaths in Custody Reporting Program
Table 11. Average annual mortality rate per 100,000 jail inmates, by most serious current offense and cause of death, 2000–2007
a/Includes other offense categories not shown in detail.
c/Includes driving while intoxicated and driving under the influence of drugs or alcohol.
d/Includes public intoxication, vagrancy, disorderly conduct, unlawful assembly, morals, and commercialized vice.
e/Includes parole or probation violations, escape, AWOL, and flight to avoid prosecution.
